entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
